title: Wis. Budget Proposal Reignites Debate Over Private, Public Sector
teaser: As Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker lays the groundwork for a presidential campaign, he's shifting his focus back home from unions to university faculty. Walker's state budget would make record cuts to the University of Wisconsin. To cope with the cuts, the governor says faculty could work more and teach more classes. Walker's comments have left some faculty aghast.
